entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Rivière-du-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-du-Loup 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: NNE 21 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9.
